TemplateSQL.FixedSQL: /**************************/ /* 공통코드조회 GetCommon */ /**************************/ SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED SELECT A.MAIN_CODE , A.SUB_CODE , A.NAME , A.LANGUAGE_CODE , A.ORDER_SEQ , A.REF_DATA1 , A.REF_DATA2 , A.REF_DATA3 , A.REF_DATA4 , A.HIDE , A.INSERT_CODE , A.INSERT_DATE , A.UPDATE_CODE , A.UPDATE_DATE FROM T_COMMON A WHERE 1=1 #[MAIN_CODE] #[SUB_CODE] #[REF_DATA1] #[REF_DATA2] #[REF_DATA3] #[REF_DATA4] #[HIDE] ORDER BY A.ORDER_SEQ SET NOCOUNT OFF

SET NOCOUNT ON /************************************************/ /* 사용자정보 - T_MEMBER 조회 - SELECT QUERY */ /************************************************/ SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED SELECT MEMBER_CODE , A.USER_TYPE , A.USER_ID , A.PASSWORD , A.USER_NAME , A.EMAIL , A.PHONE , A.MOBILE , A.ADDRESS1 , A.ADDRESS2 , A.ZIP_CODE , A.BIRTH , A.GENDER , A.REMARK , A.HIDE , A.INSERT_CODE , A.INSERT_DATE , A.UPDATE_CODE , A.UPDATE_DATE FROM T_MEMBER A
WHERE 1=1 #[USER_TYPE] SET NOCOUNT OFF

SET NOCOUNT ON /*********************************************/ /* 사용자정보 - T_MEMBER 저장 - SAVE QUERY */ /*********************************************/ DECLARE @MEMBER_CODE INT = N'{0}' , @USER_TYPE INT = CONVERT(INT, CASE WHEN ISNUMERIC('{1}') = 1 THEN '{1}' ELSE NULL END ) , @USER_ID NVARCHAR(50) = N'{2}' , @PASSWORD NVARCHAR(200) = N'{3}' , @USER_NAME NVARCHAR(100) = N'{4}' , @EMAIL NVARCHAR(100) = N'{5}' , @PHONE VARCHAR(30) = N'{6}' , @MOBILE VARCHAR(30) = N'{7}' , @ADDRESS1 NVARCHAR(200) = N'{8}' , @ADDRESS2 NVARCHAR(200) = N'{9}' , @ZIP_CODE VARCHAR(10) = N'{10}' , @REMARK NVARCHAR(1000) = N'{11}' , @HIDE BIT = CONVERT(BIT, CASE WHEN ISNUMERIC('{12}') = 1 THEN '{12}' ELSE '0' END ) , @INSERT_CODE INT = {13} , @INSERT_DATE DATETIME = GETDATE() , @UPDATE_CODE INT = {13} , @UPDATE_DATE DATETIME = GETDATE()
UPDATE A SET USER_TYPE = @USER_TYPE , USER_ID = @USER_ID , PASSWORD = @PASSWORD , USER_NAME = @USER_NAME , EMAIL = @EMAIL , PHONE = @PHONE , MOBILE = @MOBILE , ADDRESS1 = @ADDRESS1 , ADDRESS2 = @ADDRESS2 , ZIP_CODE = @ZIP_CODE , REMARK = @REMARK , HIDE = @HIDE , UPDATE_CODE = @UPDATE_CODE , UPDATE_DATE = @UPDATE_DATE FROM T_MEMBER A WHERE MEMBER_CODE= @MEMBER_CODE IF @@ROWCOUNT = 0 BEGIN INSERT INTO T_MEMBER ( USER_TYPE , USER_ID , PASSWORD , USER_NAME , EMAIL , PHONE , MOBILE , ADDRESS1 , ADDRESS2 , ZIP_CODE , REMARK , HIDE , INSERT_CODE , INSERT_DATE , UPDATE_CODE , UPDATE_DATE ) SELECT @USER_TYPE , @USER_ID , @PASSWORD , @USER_NAME , @EMAIL , @PHONE , @MOBILE , @ADDRESS1 , @ADDRESS2 , @ZIP_CODE , @REMARK , @HIDE , @INSERT_CODE , @INSERT_DATE , @UPDATE_CODE , @UPDATE_DATE END SET NOCOUNT OFF
